inclusion.criterion: preserved left-ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF > 45%) and/or heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFrEF)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: symptomatic chronic heart failure (NYHA 2-4) AND moderate to severe predominant central sleep apnea
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: participants requiring any kind of oxygen therapy
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has complex sleep apnea, preserved left-ventricular ejection fraction, and is currently on ASV therapy. However, they are also requiring oxygen therapy.
